<script>
    $(document).ready(function () {
        var allCarousels = ($("#ctl00_PlaceHolderMain_g_c04e1e75_eefc_4ad5_a7ef_ddeaaba6d2ea_hfCarousel").val());
        if (allCarousels) {
            //Carousel
            var aryCarousels;
            aryCarousels = allCarousels.split(";");
            if (aryCarousels.length > 6) {
                aryCarousels = aryCarousels.splice(0,6);
            }
            var count = aryCarousels.length;

            for (var i = 0; i < count; i++) {
                var preloadIndex = i + 1;
                $('#imgPreload' + preloadIndex).attr('src', aryCarousels[i]);
            }

            var currentIndex = 1;
            var lastIndex = 1;
            var isBeginning = true;

            setInterval(function () {
                if (currentIndex > count) {
                    currentIndex = 1;
                }
                if (isBeginning && count > 1) {
                    currentIndex = 2;
                    isBeginning = false;
                }

                $('.banner').removeClass('homepage-banner-' + lastIndex);
                $('.banner').addClass('homepage-banner-' + currentIndex);

                lastIndex = currentIndex;
                currentIndex += 1;
            }, 8000);
        }
    });
</script>
